My dad and I drove to Vancouver for my first semester at school. I packed all my belongings and a bike into an Acura sedan.
I moved to Williams lake for a summer internship with the BC Forest Service
I moved to Nelson for another summer internship with the BC Forest Service
King Salmon is where i worked for a summer with the National Park service. King Salmon is not connected to the North American road network. The only other city you can drive to is Naknek
In early 2010 I finished school in Vancouver and drove with my two friends back to Denver. We stopped in Idaho - visited the Salt Flats - and camped in Moab Utah

Drove to Dawson City YT to visit friend Whitney in my station wagon. On the way home picked up a french canadian hitchiker and gave him a 3 day ride back to Edmonton. Everytime we stopped for the night I slept in my car and he slept in his tent off the side of the highway.
While living in Williams Lake I drove out to Bella Coola to go hiking with my friend Daniel
My friend Nik and met in Prince George made cow-heart beef jerky in Burns Lake and then went to a folk music festival in Smithers
In 2008 my parents visited me in Williams Lake. We camped in the Barkersville area for the weekend.
Paragon had me drive an F250 truck from Edmonton to a pipeline job in Toronto. It was my first trans canadian journey.

My family often drove to Springfield MO to visit our Grandma Bessie
My brother was attending university at Iowa State so I went to visit him with my parents. We saw a rock concert in the student Union building.
In high school I was part of a church youth group that went to conferences with other youth groups in Miami OK

In middle school my friends parents would drive us up to Saratoga WY to go sage grouse hunting. They used dogs to flush the grouse and falcons to grab the grouse and kill them. We'd take the grouse to the Wolf Hotel in Saratoga for dinner.
While I was working at the USPS in Denver CO my friend Max and I took a two day road trip to New Mexico to visit Chaco Canyon
On our way back from Chaco Canyon we rolled through Crestone CO
When I was 4 years old my family moved to Rochester MN for 3 years
When I was unemployed I took an anti-vacation in the winter to Rochester NY to visit my friend Daniel. We explored the abandoned subway and enjoyed the snow.
I drove the famous ice fields parkway on the way home from Jasper during the winter. It was stunningly scenic.
I did a backpacking trip in the coulees of Saskatchewan around Empress Alberta with friends in the fall of 2015
While visiting my grandma in springfield MO, my family visited the tourist town of Eureka Springs
I drove to Dora MO with my brother in 2010 to visit the birth place of my Grandpa and the country cemetary that his step mother maintained and made tombstones for.
While attending a training in Anchorage AK, my mothers cousin Scotty picked me up and I got to visit him and his family in Hope AK
While visiting my relatives in Hope I was loaned a car and drove down the Kenai peninsula to Seward AK
In the winter of 2010 I flew to Puerto Vallarta Mexico and camped on the beach in Sayulita for a week.
I took a bus to guadalajara mexico and stayed in a youth hostel there.
I spent a week in Aguas Calientes Mexico and made some great friends there. They even held a bbq for me in an abandoned house when I left.
